item.title: Life science stocks are under pressure due to possible NIH funding cuts. What lies ahead for the sector
item.description: A recent move by the Trump administration has investors fearing meaningful losses to life science tools companies.

item.title: This fire retardant maker will benefit as 'wildfires wreak havoc around more populated areas,' says UBS
item.description: Perimeter Solutions stands to benefit as wildfires grow more frequent and threaten residential areas, according to UBS Securities.
